Summary: Biochemical reaction from angiotensin I to angiotensin II. This interaction can be catalyzed by CTSG, CMA1 or ACE.
Biochemical reaction from angiotensin 1-9 to angiotensin 1-7. This interaction is catalyzed by MME.
Biochemical reaction from AGT to angiotensin I. This interaction is catalyzed by REN.
Biochemical reaction from angiotensin 1-7 to angiotensin 1-5. This interaction is catalyzed by ACE.
Biochemical reaction from angiotensin I to angiotensin 1-9. This interaction is catalyzed by ACE2.
Biochemical reaction from angiotensin II to angiotensin 1-7. This interaction is catalyzed by ACE2.
Biochemical reaction from KNG1 to bradykinin. This interaction is catalyzed by ACE.
